text: Hi everyone!
As you may know, I teach a limited number of private students and every so often I offer group classes.
Well, I'm very excited to open a new course on Simor.
If you're an advanced learner of English, you won't want to miss the chance to enroll in my five-week conversation course.
This is a chance for real practice with feedback from me.
It's going to be held from July 16th to August 17th.
Registration opens June 25th. As I said,
it's for advanced learners. If you're at the intermediate level and you're interested in having
conversation practice, let me know in the comments because I do hope to offer more group classes in the future.
I'll accept up to five students for my advanced conversation course. This way everyone will have speaking time.
My students will have the chance to express their thoughts on a variety of topics, including
travel, careers, and world problems.
Students will develop both listening and speaking skills through a series of live group classes and
independent practice tasks. Live classes will be held weekly.
Independent practice tasks will be assigned twice a week.
So here are the course highlights: You get five live group classes via zoom. Each class is one hour long.
You'll also have access to our recorded sessions for reflection and analysis.
You'll complete ten independent speaking task through audio recordings.
My students and I will have access to a private discussion board on Simor, and
my students will benefit from a small group atmosphere and feedback from me.
the course fee course, requirements, and class times are posted on Simor.
Follow the link to get all the details.
I look forward to having conversations with you. Happy studies!
